headline: FDA Infant Formula Warning Could Be A Game Changer For Walmart’s (WMT) Tech-Driven Retail Strategy
summary: In recent weeks, Walmart has faced an FDA warning letter over recalled ByHeart infant formula remaining on sale in dozens of its stores, even as it expands branded offerings like Dove x Crumbl self-care products and signs new retail agreements with No Cap! Soda Pop and AXIL hearing protection. At the same time, Walmart filed a new US$16.53 billions ESOP-related shelf registration, closed two prior ESOP shelves, and continued to attract attention for insider share sales and its transition to...
